name: Dice Knock Off
description:
GAME MAY TAKE A WHILE TO LOAD

Short game made for the GMTK Game Jam.

Instructions (if unclear):
Objective: Knock of as many enemy pieces as you can
1) Click the dice to unfold it
2) Select 2 faces. These will be your "Shooting Faces"
3) Once both are selected, pieces will spawn in. Click and drag any of your faces. This will create an arrow facing towards your mouse.
4) Release your mouse

Side Note: This was the first time I ever used Godot and the first 3d game I've ever made
